title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Introducing the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR! This versatile adapter is designed to provide you with convenient and reliable power options when traveling to Italy, Uruguay, Chile, and other compatible countries (including Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Vatican City). 

Featuring a 4-in-1 outlet design, this adapter allows you to connect up to 2 American devices and 2 USB devices simultaneously, making it perfect for charging your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electric products. With a maximum capacity of 2500 watts, 250 volts, and 10 amps, you can power multiple devices without any worries.

The adapter is equipped with a grounded 3-prong plug, ensuring safety and stability during use. It accepts standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs, making it compatible with a wide range of devices. 

Measuring just 2.8 inches in length, 2.6 inches in width, and 2.3 inches in height, this adapter is ultra-light and compact, making it easy to carry in your travel bag or luggage. It's the perfect travel companion for those who value convenience and portability.

Rest assured, this adapter is CE and FCC certified, guaranteeing quality and reliability. Plus, it comes with a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service, ensuring your satisfaction and peace of mind.

Please note that this adapter is not a converter. It is designed for 100V-250V wide voltage devices. If your electronics are not low power and do not support dual voltage, please ensure they are compatible before use.

Make your travel experiences hassle-free with the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR. Don't miss out on this essential travel accessory!

Introducing the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR! This versatile adapter is perfect for your travels to Italy, Uruguay, Chile, and other compatible countries listed below. With its 4-in-1 design, you can easily plug in your devices using the 2 USB ports or 2 American outlets. 

The VINTAR Power Adapter features a grounded 3-prong plug, ensuring safety and stability during use. It is compatible with standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs, making it convenient for most devices. Please note that this adapter is not a converter, so it is important to ensure that your devices support 100V-250V dual voltage.

With a maximum capacity of 2500 watts, 250 volts, and 10 amps, this adapter can handle your high-power devices without any issues. The dual USB ports provide a fast and efficient charging experience, with an output of up to 2.4A. This makes it suitable for charging cell phones, tablets, power banks, and other electronic devices.

The VINTAR Power Adapter is designed to be ultra-light and compact, making it easy to carry in your travel bag or backpack. Its dimensions of 2.8 inches in length, 2.6 inches in width, and 2.3 inches in height ensure that it won't take up much space. Plus, it comes in a convenient 3-pack, so you'll always have extra adapters on hand.

Rest assured, this adapter meets the highest quality standards. It is CE and FCC certified, providing you with peace of mind during your travels. Additionally, the VINTAR Power Adapter comes with a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service, ensuring your satisfaction.

Don't miss out on this essential travel accessory! Grab your [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR today and stay connected wherever you go.
